bibl.title: Junichi Yamamoto v. Luther Weedin. Order Forfeiting Bond
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF JUNICHI YAMAMOTO FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS

This matter having come on regularly to be heard before the above entitled court and it appearing to the court that on the 6th day of May, 1922, there was entered herein an order denying the petitioner a writ of habeas corpus, and it further appearing to the court that the petitioner JUNICHI YAMAMOTO has heretofore filed with the clerk of this court a bond for the release of this said petition- er from custody pending the determination of this proceeding, which said bond was and is conditioned as follows:

"NOW THEREFORE, if the said Junichi Yamamoto will surrender himself to Luther Weeden, United States Commissioner of Immigration at Seattle, Washington, in the event that the petition of the said Junichi Yamamoto is denied, or in the event that the said Junichi Yamamoto is remanded to the custody of the said Luther Weeden, United States Commissioner of Immigration at Seattle, Washington, by the above entitled court, then these presents shall be void, otherwise to remain in full force and effect."

And it further appearing to the court that heretofore and on to wit, the 11th day of July, 1922, there was entered herein an order remanding the said petitioner to the custody of the said Commissioner of Immigration, the respondent herein, and it further appearing to the court from the affidavit of the

respondent herein that the said petitioner has wholly failed, neglected and refused to surrender himself into the custody of the respondent as directed by said letter order and as pro- vided in said bond, and the court being fully advised in the premises, now, therefore, it is hereby
ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that the said bail bond of the petitioner JUNICHI YAMAMOTO be, and the same is hereby, forfeited.
DONE in open court this 29 day of July, 1922.
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF JUNICHI YAMAMOTO FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS
FILED IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
